attributes.action: Commission a review into the diagnosis and treatment of SIBO
attributes.additional_details: We need to improve the treatment of this complex disorder. Finding root causes are the way forward but this can take time & education of our consultants. What's happening is patients in some areas will be diagnosed but there is no follow upon treatment. It takes time to cure this disorder & can take a few rounds & tests to cure SIBO. Some areas aren’t even able to test for it or offer treatment.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to review how the NHS manages Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth (SIBO), to ensure patients are consistently and effectively diagnosed and treated.
